    • Constructor Detail

      • Taxes

        public Taxes(double inflation,
             int currentAge,
             int currentYear,
             int deathAge,
             double federalTaxRate,
             double stateTaxRate)
        This constructor builds the initial data structure.
        Parameters:
        inflation - The expected yearly growth rate of the account.
        currentAge - The current age of the person
        currentYear - The current year of the person owning the account
        deathAge - The expected death age of the person
        federalTaxRate - The effective tax rate for computation of federal taxes
        stateTaxRate - The tax rate for computation of state taxes

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        public double compute(int age,
                      double taxableAmount)
        Calculate the yearly federal and state taxes
        Parameters:
        age - The current age
        taxableAmount - Amount that is taxable
        Returns:
        The total taxes due
